Tankor thought for a while. A non-agression pact would be a great 
thing if thing got hotter with the Infecticons. But none of this was 
up to him.

Meanwhile, he backtracked the message and found out it was from the 
approximate area of operation of the mission.

Tankor: I am not authorized to take such a decision. There is a plus, 
though. The commander will lead a mission near your base. If I may, I 
suggest you meet him there. I a not aware of the precise coordinates 
though.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Shivah:
> 
> "I'll turn on the out guns, go quickly to rescue him" said shiva to 
> Drillbit by comm link. After do that  Shivah said to Tankor "Sorry 
> but i've had a little emergency... Now the alliance that that I like 
> negociate coul be no agression pact to work to destroy mutual 
> enemies..."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > He hears the message from SS come in on the comm computer in the
> > computers room, that kept track of communication too and from the 
> base.
> > "Shivah, there is a bot outside, asking for your help."
> > He checks the external sensors.
> > "The bot appears to have gone into stasis. I'll go get him."
> > DrillBit starts to make his way outside the volcano, too SS.
